statements.name: PROC LUA
statements.description: Runs Lua statements within a SAS session.

statements.name: SUBMIT
statements.description: Identifies the beginning of a block of Lua code. Enter Lua statements between the SUBMIT and ENDSUBMIT statements.

statements.name: ENDSUBMIT
statements.description: Identifies the end of a block of Lua statements. Do not enter any other statement on the same line as the ENDSUBMIT statement.
